data.name: Capytales: Capybara Girl to the Rescue
data.detailed_description:
Dry Body broke free and it was up to Capytu, a powerful and adorable clumsy magical girl, to arrest him and stop him from doing any harm to animals.
But fear nothing! She created a bunch of magic blocks so Corpse Seco would stay away from the animals.

All right, isn't it?
...

Unfortunately not. Because now everyone is trapped in their magic blocks.
Now she needs to solve this mess, facing the mysterious figures of Brazilian Folklore, while saving the animals of the Cerrado.

She accompanies Capytu, the Magical Capybara Girl on her adventure to stop this villain!
Solve puzzles, creatively fire your spirits to avoid obstacles and enemies, explore every corner of the maps for unique collectibles, and defeat fearsome creatures from Brazilian regional myths in this unique adventure!


24 complete levels.
Different approaches to platform challenges.
Bosses and enemies based on Brazilian regional myths.
Capybaras, several of them!!

data.short_description: Accompany Capytu on his journey against the terrifying Corpo-Seco. Face terrifying enemies from Brazilian Folklore, as you run and shoot your magical spirits along the way, solving puzzles, platform challenges, and collecting all the collectibles hidden throughout the game's 24 levels.
data.supported_languages:
English, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card
